text: Matthew Malcolm John Bibb, was a Rhodesia and Nyasaland international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== He won a bronze medal in the fours at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth with John Milligan, Ronnie Turner and Victor Blyth. ==References== Category:Date of birth unknown Category:Date of death unknown Category:Zimbabwean male bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Rhodesia and Nyasaland Category:Bowls players at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Malcolm Bibb
